snippet: A potentially lethal storm could cause more power failures and minor to moderate flooding along the coastal areas that were devastated by the hurricane last week.
abstract: Northeast is now bracing for a potentially dangerous northeaster expected to bring rain, punishing winds and high tides that could add to the misery of residents still reeling from Hurricane Sandy and set back the restoration of power; storm could cause more power failures and minor to moderate flooding along the coastal areas that were devastated by the hurricane.
lead_paragraph: A potentially lethal storm could cause more power failures and minor to moderate flooding along the coastal areas that were devastated by the hurricane last week.

headline.main: Midweek Northeaster May Stymie Recovery Efforts With Floods and Loss of Power
headline.print_headline: Northeaster Forecast for Midweek May Stymie Recovery Efforts
